conjunction.name: Sacred Union
conjunction.spiritual_meaning: Two energies become one unified force
conjunction.anulunar_wisdom: Conjunctions are cosmic marriages - honor the union
conjunction.interpretation_guide: These planets work as one integrated energy in your spiritual development

opposition.name: Divine Tension
opposition.spiritual_meaning: Learning to hold both ends of the cosmic spectrum
opposition.anulunar_wisdom: Opposition creates the tension needed for spiritual growth
opposition.interpretation_guide: These planets represent opposite poles seeking integration and balance

trine.name: Flowing Grace
trine.spiritual_meaning: Gifts that flow easily when aligned with soul purpose
trine.anulunar_wisdom: Trines are gifts - but remember to unwrap them
trine.interpretation_guide: These planets work together effortlessly, offering natural talents and ease

square.name: Sacred Challenge
square.spiritual_meaning: Friction that creates diamonds in the soul
square.anulunar_wisdom: Squares are your spiritual gym - they make you stronger
square.interpretation_guide: These planets create productive tension that motivates growth and achievement

sextile.name: Opportunity Portal
sextile.spiritual_meaning: Doorways of possibility requiring conscious activation
sextile.anulunar_wisdom: Sextiles whisper 'yes, you can' - listen closely
sextile.interpretation_guide: These planets offer supportive energy and opportunities when actively engaged
